```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
countries <-
  st_read("~/Downloads/ne_10m_admin_0_countries/ne_10m_admin_0_countries.shp")
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = countries) +
  coord_sf()
```


```{r}
states <-
  st_read("~/Downloads/ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces/ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces.shp")
```


```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = states) +
  coord_sf()
```

```{r}
us_states <- 
  states |>
  filter(admin == "United States of America")
```


```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = us_states) +
  coord_sf() 
```




```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = us_states) +
  coord_sf(crs = st_crs("EPSG:5072")) 
```
